alert.note: Alert for Dorchester; Somerset; Wicomico (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 5:55PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Somerset, southwestern Wicomico and southern Dorchester Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 554 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms near Saint Inigoes Creek, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Deal Island around 640 PM EDT. Westover around 705 PM EDT. Princess Anne around 710 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Green Hill, Wetipquin, Oriole, Trinity, Fairmount, Upper Hill, Smith Island, Hopewell, Royal Oak and Rehobeth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
